resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/156493</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>156493</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3077</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Israels Story in Maps</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Israels Geschichte in den Karten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Histoire d'Israels dans les cartes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">História de Israels nos mapas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Storia di Israels in programmi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ιστορία Israels στους χάρτες</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Historia de Israels en correspondencias</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is an resource containing a large archive of maps and charts which illustrate the History of Israel</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">maps</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist ein Hilfsmittel, das ein großes Archiv
der Karten enthalten und Diagramme, die die Geschichte von Israel 
veranschaulichen</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est une ressource contenant de grandes archives 
des cartes et des diagrammes qui illustrent l'histoire de l'Israel</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta é um recurso que contêm um arquivo grande 
dos mapas e as cartas que ilustrem o history de Israel</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è una risorsa che contengono un grande 
archivio dei programmi e tabelle che illustrano la storia 
dell'Israele</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι ένα στοιχείο συμπεριφοράς που περιέχει 
ένα μεγάλο αρχείο των χαρτών και των διαγραμμάτων που επεξηγούν 
την ιστορία του Ισραήλ</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ésta es un recurso que contiene un archivo grande
de correspondencias y las cartas que ilustran la historia de Israel</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Karten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">cartes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">mapas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">programmi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">χάρτες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">correspondencias</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

          <status>

            <value>final</value>

        <classification>
